title: How to write rap songs and rap like Eminem - Quora

response.answer_text: He worked for the skills, he is pure skills & dedication to the end..! For that you have to dedicate & study Eminem's songs word to word, for the flow ,d purpose, brilliance in it, rhyme scheme,watch all his freestyle videos so many are there, I was lucky to get those videos to watch, before he blew up cuz it showed how he worked on his skills,, how he connects words & the way he bends words as per his needs is an amazing thing to witness.. He is art ! I have studied Eminem for so long n still do,, Just check buffalo bill ,same song & dance,3 am & all of relapse ,n all the Platinum albums he has ,& everything he does to see his brilliance in bending hip hop for his album is crazy ! The greatest rapper ! He revived 2000’s hip-hop! #stan..♥️♥️

Until and unless you are not in the same dilemma as he was or life is not chucking or testing you up on every spot like he was.sense of humorknows the difference b/w whats wrong and right in every instance thrown at himperfect knowledge of wordplay and word schemas and shady have digested all of the dictionary, lolnever back down, keep on doing what you’re best at and work on it till the time you feel mission accomplished“You can do anything, You set your mind to men” - Eminem (‘Lose Yourself ’ outro)
